verses.roman:
pathe sārvabhauma saha sabāra milana
sārvabhauma bhaṭṭācāryera kāśīte gamana

synonyms: pathe—on the way; sārvabhauma—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; saha—with; sabāra—of everyone; milana—meeting; sārvabhauma bhaṭṭācāryera—of the devotee named Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; kāśīte—to Vārāṇasī; gamana—going.
translation: Everyone met Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya on his way to Vārāṇasī.
